S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-3509: The replication log shipper is not notified when a new replication transmitter is instantiated in MC#handleException. - Modified the handleException method to return the transmitter object that is created. - The log shipper bases its decision on whether it should continue with the log shipping based on if a valid transmitter object is created. Contributed by V Narayanan
Merged to 10.4 branch with command: svn merge -r644290:644291 https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/db/derby/code/trunk/
